title: Huobi hacker returns 4997 ETH stolen via hot wallet breach, receives $400k bounty
description:
In a surprising turn of events, the hacker responsible for stealing a large sum of Ethereum from HTX Global, formerly Huobi, has refunded the entire stolen amount for the white-hat bounty offered by the exchange, on-chain sleuth Zachxbt reported Oct. 7. The breach occurred on Sept. 25, with the hacker stealing a total of 4,997 […]

The post Huobi hacker returns 4997 ETH stolen via hot wallet breach, receives $400k bounty appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nansen CEO Alex Svanevik Forecasts Six Key Trends Shaping the Future of Crypto
description: On 6 October 2023, Alex Svanevik, the CEO of blockchain analytics startup Nansen, took to social media platform X to share his insights on the future of the cryptocurrency space.
